newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Seafresh 15-mth loss widens to NZ$2.39mln.
newsitem.headline: Seafresh 15-mth loss widens to NZ$2.39mln.

text.p: Note - Seafresh New Zealand Ltd, formerly Lectrica Holdings Ltd, is a fishing fleet operator. In January 1996 shareholders approved the purchase of the Seafresh fishing business by the issue of 58.8 million shares to the Lim family, and the consolidation of 18 million existing Lectrica shares into 1.2 million shares.
The 15-month result included a write down of half of the goodwill arising out of the acquisition of Seafresh in January. NZ$3.7 million was written off against operating profit.
